actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide for the payment of certain court costs in civil rights actions brought in U.S. courts by prisoners.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Provides for the payment of witness' fees in civil rights actions brought in United States courts by prisoners asserting the violation of a constitutional right arising out of the imprisonment.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the payment of certain court costs in civil rights actions brought in U.S. courts by prisoners.
